ygData.subject: Re: Band of rodcet life
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Y know those Koalindl fish corpse from the Stein quest? Well, you have to return them to that paladin swimming in the pond where you find the fish; his
ygData.messageBody:
> From: hans ng <nahemah@...>

> help me out here i cant seem to find the info on the quest to get
> the band.any knows wat i must do?

Y'know those Koalindl fish corpse from the Stein quest? Well, you
have to return them to that paladin swimming in the pond where
you find the fish; his name's Enic Ruklin, I think. He will then give
you either Prayer Beads or the Band.

The fish corpses are NODROP, and so is the Band, I think, so you
have to do some fancy mule manipulation to get the corpse without
getting severe faction hits with the priests and guards of qeynos.

And that guy Enic will kill you dead if you get too close while killing
the fish...


--


Love is in the air...
Get me a gas mask, quick!!!

Cya,
Praetor
